name: electron-vue-vite
description: Really simple Electron + Vue + Vite boilerplate.
author: 草鞋没号 <308487730@qq.com>

scripts.build: vue-tsc --noEmit && vite build && npm run build:worker && electron-builder
scripts.build:worker:tsc: tsc electron/workers/systemTaskWorker.ts --outDir dist-electron/workers --target es2020 --module commonjs --esModuleInterop --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --skipLibCheck && mv dist-electron/workers/systemTaskWorker.js dist-electron/workers/systemTaskWorker.cjs
